snippet: Officials in Moscow are angry over the financial and travel restrictions on human rights violators that were attached to the bill making Russia a full trading partner with the United States.
abstract: Congressional bill making Russia full trading partner with United States riles officials in Moscow because of provision imposing steep penalties on Russians designated as violators of human rights.

byline.contributor: Ellen Barry and Andrew E. Kramer contributed reporting from Moscow.

lead_paragraph: Officials in Moscow are angry over the financial and travel restrictions on human rights violators that were attached to the bill making Russia a full trading partner with the United States.

headline.seo: Bill on Russia Trade Sets Off Acrimony on Rights
headline.main: Bill on Russia Trade Ties Sets Off New Acrimony
headline.print_headline: Bill on Russia Trade Ties Sets Off New Acrimony

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
